name: github
description: Full GitHub API access: read and create issues, pull requests, and files; search repositories; manage branches; and trigger workflows. The agent can open PRs, triage issues, and read code directly from any repo you have access to.
author: Anthropic

env_vars.label: Personal Access Token
env_vars.description: A GitHub PAT with repo and workflow scopes. Generate one at github.com/settings/tokens.

setup_notes: Generate a GitHub Personal Access Token at github.com/settings/tokens with the `repo` scope (and `workflow` if you need Actions access).
